entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sydney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:21 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 09:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.4°C
Wind: SE 29 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers at times heavy. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy with risk of a thundershower. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm except 20 mm in the heaviest showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 this morning then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:23 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 06:23 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:23 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
